statements: SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_status, property_id FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE policy_id = 1001 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount, property_id FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_id > 100 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount >= 5000 AND claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_id;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, property_id FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000 AND claim_status != 'Denied';
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE policy_id IS NULL ORDER BY claim_date ASC, property_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM flood_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, coverage_amount FROM policy_data WHERE coverage_amount >= 100000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE deductible < 1000;
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, deductible, coverage_amount FROM policy_data WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%earthquake%';
SELECT policy_id, insured_name, premium_amount FROM underwriting_data WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT risk_score, coverage_amount FROM underwriting_data WHERE risk_score > 0.7 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, location FROM flood_claims WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND claim_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT insured_name, premium_amount, coverage_amount FROM underwriting_data WHERE risk_score > 0.8 ORDER BY insured_name ASC;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM risk_factors WHERE LENGTH(factor_description) > 100 ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT claim_date, location, claim_amount FROM flood_claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY location, claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Flood_Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Flood_Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, address FROM Policy_Holders ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT zone_name, risk_level FROM Flood_Zones WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT policy_id, decision_date FROM Underwriting_Decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, damage_description FROM Flood_Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_holder_name, address, phone_number FROM Policy_Holders WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, risk_level FROM Flood_Zones WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT decision_id, policy_id, decision_date, decision_result FROM Underwriting_Decisions WHERE decision_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, damage_description FROM Flood_Claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalClaims;
SELECT claim_date, claim_type, claim_amount FROM HistoricalClaims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, affected_area FROM HistoricalClaims WHERE claim_type = 'Flood Damage';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM FloodRiskFactors WHERE factor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalClaims WHERE claim_type = 'Property Damage' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, affected_area FROM HistoricalClaims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND claim_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM HistoricalClaims WHERE affected_area LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature <= 20 OR rainfall >= 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, rainfall DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name, factor_description FROM FloodRiskFactors ORDER BY factor_id LIMIT 5;
